article.p: All the javascript used are can be found in /script folder of enhancement.js. Comments are included in the enhancement.js

Scroll Indicator effect - Link W3Schools show the example. All the webpages have scroll indicator. To have the scroll effect, the hieght of the individual webpage must be considered. And according to the webpage height, percentage of scrolled will be included and be display as an indicator to indicate the webpage scrolled.

Event Count Down - Link W3School show the example. Only Event webpage got this effect. The date is used in this function, where var of date, hours, minutes and seconds are require to declare variable. Then, calculation of the current date and the incoming date will be calculated and display to the website.

Image Grid - Link W3Schools to show example. Only Photo Gallery webpage have this effect. This enhancements.js are put inside script folder. This enhancements uses for loop function that count the amount of div class column which is 4. The flex have sets the length of the class to 50% so that it would fit in the webpage nicely.

Modal Image Gallery / Lightbox - Link W3Schools to show example.Only Photo Gallery webpage have this effect. The enhancements is to show the modal image gallery or lightbox for this page. The div element with class row is for user to click to show the lightbox. While div element with column is the image that will show in the lightbox. Variable captionText in the enhancements is to show the caption of the pictures which uses the alt text as a caption for the image. There are also next button, previous button and also close button after user click on the image in the photo.html.

All of this enhancement mostly can be found and learned in W3School. The team find that W3School is a very powerful website where all html, css, jss and php resources are available. The team feel accomplish whenever team members had successfully develop the enhancements with current html, css and JavaScript
